long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AdsNextGen is a Chrome extension that helps users search and calculate advertising services.

üîç Search for services:
Users can enter keywords in the search box and press the "Search" button to search for related advertising services. When searching, the application will automatically return corresponding results.

üßÆ Calculate the amount received:
In addition, the application provides the feature to calculate the amount received based on data entered by the user. By entering the monthly amount and the number of months to calculate, users can get detailed information about the total amount received after each number of months entered.

Application developed by ADSNEXTGEN which is an affiliate marketing network agency in the world. We are a CPA traffic and CPA network solutions provider.
- Address: Room 204, 2nd floor, UST Tower, No. 637-639 Nguyen Tat Thanh, Xuan Ha Ward, Thanh Khe District, City. Da Nang, Vietnam
